ygData.subject: Mystical Alliance
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, Our guild has now become official on Brell Serilis. Dedric now has  floating over his head. So far, we have volunteers to be
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings,
Our guild has now become official on Brell Serilis. Dedric now has <Mystical
Alliance> floating over his head.

So far, we have volunteers to be guildmasters on the following servers.
E'ci, Bristlebane, Rodcet Nife, Erollisi Marr and Innoruuk

I will try to get as many of these set up on those servers as I can on Aug. 15th
when I return from my vacation.

In the meantime, Christina has created a character on Brell named Ranebow who is
an officer in the guild and can get others into the guild on that server. Contact
her in game via her Luna character.

Also, for those of you who have not heard, one of the most exciting things to
ever happen in the world of Norrath is a big mystery sequence of events involving
10 slaughtered Paladins in Freeport. This is a GM run event/quest. Check out the
news groups, etc. for more info. If you needed another reason to move to Brell,
this is it.

Hugs,
David
